xtc.lang.cpp
Class Syntax

java.lang.Object
  xtc.tree.Node
      xtc.tree.Token
          xtc.lang.cpp.Syntax
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Object>, Locatable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Syntax.Conditional, Syntax.Directive, Syntax.Language, Syntax.Layout
public abstract class Syntax
extends Token

Support for syntax objects. This class is not yet used. Each syntax object supports a number of flags, efficiently implemented through a bit mask. Their main usage is by the preprocessor to control macro expansion.

Version:
$Revision: 1.2 $

Field Detail

MAX_FLAGS

public static final int MAX_FLAGS
The maximum flag number. Flags are numbered from 0 to this number.
